Articles.Content:
Well I just had another fantastic idea, thought I would come to the source first...

Pin ball scoring, as in, millions and billions of points...and adjust unlocks accordingly.

Even to how many meters are traveled equal 1 point each somehow.

I am an avid pinball player and this game has so many relevant points to it.

It just makes sense.

If you don't know the sensation of scoring millions in pin ball, go find an 'Attack from Mars' pinball machine and destroy the last martian ship and try to destroy mars...

Even if you have a good one in your city, its worth spending $20 on top get to the last ship. Just be careful for martian attacks, strobe mulits etc.

The thing about pinball scoring is it competes with money machines with flashing lights and making sounds all things that this game perhaps need to polish it off and release it as the best PC game ever made.

Easily done now, much benefit for the periapsis beyond.

Anyone! who knows the layering of different actions on a pinball table towards the game play and objectives...?
